newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle market steady at $65 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle market steady at $65 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Panhandle area Thursday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were steady in a light test.

Feedlots reporting moderate inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 3,600 head slaughter steers and 700 heifers; 69,200 head confirmed for the week to date which includes 24,700 formulated and 3,100 head previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1100-1250 lbs 65.00. Pen Select and Choice 1-3 1200 lb Holsteins 59.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1000-1150 lbs 65.00. Select and Choice 2-4 1100-1200 lbs, including heiferettes 61.00-62.00.
Confirmed - 4,300 Week Ago - None Year Ago - 1,100
Wk to Date - 69,200 Week Ago - 85,200 Year Ago - 19,300
